name: DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT - Collector's Edition
summary: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot, Collectible Steelbook, Exclusive diorama (20x20x20cm), Game Artbook (25x30cm), World Hub Map (48x31cm), The game’s Season Pass, to extend your adventure in the world of DRAGON BALL Z
